languages.text: "Заткнись, пока я не сдал тебя за преступные разговоры! Ты в своем уме, такое болтать вслух? Держи язык за зубами, понял?!"

traits.locale_text: [Draft] А ну заткнулся быстро! Пока нас кто-то не услышал и чтоб я больше не слышал таких разговоров, понял?!

languages.text: "Shut up before I rat you out for treasonous talk! Are you out of your mind — prattling out loud like that? Keep your mouth shut, got it?"
languages.original_text: "Заткнись, пока я не сдал тебя за преступные разговоры! Ты в своем уме, такое болтать вслух? Держи язык за зубами, понял?!"

traits.locale_text: "Shut up before I rat you out for treasonous talk! Are you out of your mind — prattling out loud like that? Keep your mouth shut, got it?"
"Shut up before I rat you out for treasonous talk! Are you out of your mind — prattling out loud like that? Keep your mouth shut, got it?"
"Shut up before I rat you out for treasonous talk! Are you out of your mind — prattling out loud like that? Keep your mouth shut, got it?"

languages.text: “给我闭嘴！否则我就要举报你的叛国言论了！这么大声地说这种话，你是不是疯了？给我把嘴闭上，听懂了吗？”
languages.original_text: "Shut up before I rat you out for treasonous talk! Are you out of your mind — prattling out loud like that? Keep your mouth shut, got it?"

traits.locale_text: “给我闭嘴！否则我就要举报你的叛国言论了！这么大声地说这种话，你是不是疯了？给我把嘴闭上，听懂了吗？”

languages.text: «¡Que te calles antes de que te delate por traición! ¿Has perdido la cabeza para decir esto en voz alta? Cierra la boca de una vez, ¿entendido?».
languages.original_text: "Shut up before I rat you out for treasonous talk! Are you out of your mind — prattling out loud like that? Keep your mouth shut, got it?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Que te calles antes de que te delate por traición! ¿Has perdido la cabeza para decir esto en voz alta? Cierra la boca de una vez, ¿entendido?».

languages.text: 「反逆罪で突き出される前に黙れ！そんなにベラベラ喋って…正気か？口を閉じろ、分かったな？」
languages.original_text: "Shut up before I rat you out for treasonous talk! Are you out of your mind — prattling out loud like that? Keep your mouth shut, got it?"

traits.locale_text: 「反逆罪で突き出される前に黙れ！そんなにベラベラ喋って…正気か？口を閉じろ、分かったな？」

languages.text: "Seid still, oder ich melde Euch wegen verräterischer Reden! Seid Ihr wahnsinnig – so laut daherzuschwafeln? Ihr haltet den Mund, ist das klar?"
languages.original_text: "Shut up before I rat you out for treasonous talk! Are you out of your mind — prattling out loud like that? Keep your mouth shut, got it?"

traits.locale_text: "Seid still, oder ich melde Euch wegen verräterischer Reden! Seid Ihr wahnsinnig – so laut daherzuschwafeln? Ihr haltet den Mund, ist das klar?"

languages.text: « Maintenant silence, ou je jure que j'irai moi-même dénoncer ces propos ! Ça ne va pas, non ? De parler aussi fort ? La ferme, c'est compris ? »
languages.original_text: "Shut up before I rat you out for treasonous talk! Are you out of your mind — prattling out loud like that? Keep your mouth shut, got it?"

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant silence, ou je jure que j'irai moi-même dénoncer ces propos ! Ça ne va pas, non ? De parler aussi fort ? La ferme, c'est compris ? »

languages.text: "Seni haince konuşmaların yüzünden şikâyet etmeden önce kapa çeneni! Aklını mı yitirdin de böyle beyinsiz beyinsiz konuşuyorsun? Ağzını kapalı tut, anladın mı beni?"
languages.original_text: "Shut up before I rat you out for treasonous talk! Are you out of your mind — prattling out loud like that? Keep your mouth shut, got it?"

traits.locale_text: "Seni haince konuşmaların yüzünden şikâyet etmeden önce kapa çeneni! Aklını mı yitirdin de böyle beyinsiz beyinsiz konuşuyorsun? Ağzını kapalı tut, anladın mı beni?"
